answers.answer: Fibroscans are used in place of a liver biopsy to determine the stage of fibrosis, has nothing to do with type 2 diabetes. Try posting on the Liver Disease forum. If caused by HCV, post on the hep c forum too.Good luck

question: I have received the following reading of my fibroscan today please tell me if it is ok my shot & sgpt levels are also little higher please response ASAP.My fibro scan readings areCap (db/m).          E (kpa)Median 352.            48.0Iqr 7.                         Iqr 2.8Iqr/med 2%.             iqr/med 6%
title: Fibros Scan reading
